definition: to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude

sentences.english: I have no house and slumber in this city.
sentences.chinese: 我没有房子，在这个城市蛰居。

definition: to make one's home in/to reside in/to inhabit
to lead a quiet and peaceful life in retirement/to stay home with nothing to do/to lead a solitary life
to live in a foreign place/to live somewhere as a guest
to shut the door and remain inside/fig. to cut off contact
to lurk under water/to immerse oneself in (study etc)/to lie low/to keep a low profile/quiet/reserved/self-possessed
to stay idle at home/to have resigned from office/to be unemployed/to have been fired/to be on a sabbatical
to drift (in the tide)/to rove/to lead a wandering existence/drifter/wanderer
